data.prayer: Father, encourage the 21,041 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sơn La, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Sơn La, Vietnam. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sơn La, Vietnam. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 972,800 people living in Sơn La.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Kim Mun people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 21,041 believers in Sơn La.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Sơn La, Vietnam to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Sơn La, Vietnam.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
